cetus.exec

Class CommandLineOptionSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.exec.CommandLineOptionSet

  • public class CommandLineOptionSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for registering and managing information of options.

        usage - the usage of the option.

       java.lang.String arg,
       java.lang.String usage)
        Registers a new UTILITY option with the given argument and usage information.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the option.
        arg - the argument allowed for the option.
        usage - the usage of the option.

       java.lang.String name,

        Registers a new option with the given type and usage information.
        Parameters:
        type - the category to which the option belongs.
        name - the name of the option.
        usage - the usage of the option.

      • add

        public void add(int type,
       java.lang.String name,
       java.lang.String value,
       java.lang.String arg,
       java.lang.String usage)
        Registers a new option with the given type, value, argument, and usage.
        Parameters:
        type - the category to which the option belongs.
        name - the name of the option.
        value - the default value of the option.
        arg - the argument allowed for the option.
        usage - the usage of the option.

      • add

        public void add(int type,
       java.lang.String name,
       java.lang.String value,
       java.lang.String value_on,
       java.lang.String arg,
       java.lang.String usage)
        Registers a new option with the given type, value, turn-on value, argument, and usage.
        Parameters:
        type - the category to which the option belongs.
        name - the name of the option.
        value - the default value of the option.
        value_on - the default value when the option is turned on without a value
        arg - the argument allowed for the option.
        usage - the usage of the option.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the option set contains an option with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to be searched for.
        Returns:
        true if such an option exists.

            java.lang.String value)
        Sets a new value for the specified option name.

      • setValue

        public void setValue(java.lang.String name)
        Copies the default value from predefined one. This is necessary for a case where user does not specify a value but just turns on the option.

      • getType

        public int getType(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the type of the specified option name.

      • include

        public void include(java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String hir_type,
           java.lang.String hir_name)
        Includes the specified IR type and name in the inclusion set for the specified option name.
        Parameters:
        name - the affected option name.
        hir_type - the IR type.
        hir_name - the IR name.
